    @allure.feature("Shopping Cart")
    @allure.story("Add Multiple Products and Verify Total")
    @pytest.mark.ui
    def test_shopping_cart_total(page: Page, home_page):
        """
        Test Case: Add multiple products to cart and verify the total price.
        """
        with allure.step("1. Navigate to Home Page"):
            home_page.navigate_home()
    
        with allure.step("2. Add first product to cart"):
            # Get the first product's name and price
            product_1 = page.locator(home_page.PRODUCT_CARD).first
            price_text_1 = product_1.locator("[data-test='product-price']").inner_text()
            # Clean price string (remove currency symbols, etc)
            price_1 = float(price_text_1.replace("$", "").replace(",", ""))
    
            product_1.click()
            page.locator("[data-test='add-to-cart']").click()
    
            # Wait for cart update
            expect(page.locator("[data-test='cart-quantity']")).to_have_text("1")
    
            # Go back home
            page.goto("/")
    
        with allure.step("3. Add second product to cart"):
            # Get second product
            product_2 = page.locator(home_page.PRODUCT_CARD).nth(1)
            price_text_2 = product_2.locator("[data-test='product-price']").inner_text()
            price_2 = float(price_text_2.replace("$", "").replace(",", ""))
    
            product_2.click()
            page.locator("[data-test='add-to-cart']").click()
    
            expect(page.locator("[data-test='cart-quantity']")).to_have_text("2")
    
        with allure.step("4. Navigate to Cart and Verify Total"):
            page.goto("/cart")
    
            # Check individual items in cart
            cart_items = page.locator("[data-test='cart-item']")
>           expect(cart_items).to_have_count(2)
